name: @neiwad/svelte-i18n-slots
description: Transform i18n variables into slots within Svelte components.
readme:
# Svelte-i18n-slots > A simple Svelte component that transform i18n variables into Slots. # Installation ``` pnpm install @neiwad/svelte-i18n-slots ``` # Requirements üåç svelte-i18n installed # Example ### I18n Configuration ```json { "string": "This is example of how to use {slot1} as i18n {slot2}.", "slot1Text": "slot", "slort2Text": "variable" } ``` ### Svelte Component ```js import { I18nSlots } from "@neiwad/svelte-i18n-slots" ``` ```js

{$_('slot1Text')} {$_('slort2Text')}

``` ### Result ```html

This is example of how to use slot as i18n variable

``` # Known issues ### Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') Appears when **** is wrapped directly inside an **if** statement. ```js {#if !$user.isAuthenticated} ... {/if} ``` To fix that issue, put your **** inside another tag as a or a
```js {#if !$user.isAuthenticated} ... {/if} ```
